segments.text: I notice the boy climbing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far that the stool looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing right there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this right under the woman’s nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so distracted by the dishes that she doesn’t see any of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring out of the sink, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall if he reaches any further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, like she’s been waiting for this moment all day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like it’s about to collapse into chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
